reviews: Very nice hotel, I would recommend this place for huge families! My family and I had a great time here!
Amazing services and features, it's a must visit resort if you love sea food!
Beautifully built, if you are a traveller, you must definitely visit this place
Amazing place, I love it a lot. The food was great, the people there were even more great
Big fan of the hotel's signature chicken dish. One of the best places I've ever been to!
